europeana:record.dc:title: Revisionary notes on the subfamily Orgilinae (Hymenoptera: Braconidae)
Zoologische Verhandelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Achterberg, van C.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Insecta

Braconidae; Orgilinae; Antestrigini; Mimagathidini; Orgilini; Antestrix; Orgilonia; Stantonia; Clotildea; Petiorgilus; Kerorgilus; Orgilus; keys; distribution; Indo-Aus- tralian; Afrotropical; Neotropical; Nearctic; Palaearctic.
europeana:record.dc:description: Keys are given to the genera and subgenera of the subfamily Orgilinae (Hymenoptera: Braconidae). One new tribe, three new genera, three new subgenera, and 27 new species are described. New combinations are: Orgilonia ashmeadi (Viereck, 1911), Orgilus columbianus (Enderlein, 1912), O. westermanni (Enderlein, 1912), O. rubriceps (Ashmead, 1894), and Stantonia lutea (Sz√©pligeti, 1910). A lectotype is designated for Stantonia conspurcata Enderlein, 1905.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Revisionary notes on the subfamily Orgilinae (Hymenoptera: Braconidae) (URN:ISSN:0024-1652) (Volume 242) (Issue 1)
